text: "Be My Baby" is a 1992 song by French singer-songwriter Vanessa Paradis and is the leading single from her third studio album Vanessa Paradis. It was a top 10 hit in the United Kingdom, France, Germany, Ireland, the Netherlands and Belgium and went to number 26 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== * Standard # "Be My Baby" – 3:19 # "The Future Song" – 4:54 * UK maxi-CD single # "Be My Baby" # "The Future Song" # "Joe le taxi" * US cassette single :A. "Be My Baby" – 3:41 :B. "Paradis" – 3:03 ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Vanessa Paradis songs
title: Be My Baby (Vanessa Paradis song)
